channel.description: Recent content in API on Mingxuan Yang

item.title: Data Extraction Using Star Wars API
item.description: Introduction This blog is to extract data through SWAPI, the Star Wars API, in the Python environment. The details of SWAPI can be obtained at its documentation. API is the abbreviation for Application Programming Interface, which enables data transmission between multiple software intermediaries. Using this tool, information can be accessed through different data formats. SWAPI provides six attributes about Star Wars. They are films people planets species starships vehicles These data can be rendered by two types of encodings in SWAPI, which are
